title: Melissa & Tye
overview: There are few things worse than being dumped on national television, but former Dallas Cowboys Cheerleader Melissa Rycroft has definitely succeeded in turning heartbreak into redemption. After becoming a hugely popular contestant on Dancing with the Stars, Melissa ignited a major television hosting career and reconnected with the real man of her dreams, hometown boyfriend Tye Strickland. Now married with a young daughter, Melissa is about to embark on her biggest journey yet moving to Los Angeles to pursue her Hollywood dreams, while managing a long-distance relationship.
